short_definition: You cause to be madeit is a writ of execution commanding the sheriff to levy on (encumber, restrict the ownership) judgment debtor's property and make (by sale or otherwise as allowed by law) the amount of the judgment plus costs of executing this process (including costs of conducting the sale).
